message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you do $105?
I'm getting close, Bob! I can do $115, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, but I'm still interested in the product. Can you do $112?
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. I can do $117, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close, but I'm still not there. Can you do $114?
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I can do $119, but that's my absolute limit. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm really close, but I think I can do better. Can you do $116?
